item.title: The Internet
item.description: The InternetTo learn more about background protocols, concepts, and the Internet, refer to How does the Internet work? External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Glossary
item.description: GlossarySee definitions for Cloudflare terms. ​​ account Accounts group one or more members together with specific roles or permissions. Accounts can be associated with any number of domains. ​​ allowlist An allowlist list of items (usually websites, IP addresses, email addresses, etc.) that are permitted to access a system. Related terms: blocklist ​​ API key An API key is unique to each Cloudflare user and used to confirm identity when using the Cloudflare API.
